sources.title: Smoke Signal (1955)
sources.description: Dana Andrews, Piper Laurie, Rex Reason, William Talman, William Schallert

metadata.Plot: Capt. Harper's cavalry patrol returns to the fort to find it besieged by Ute Indians. The apparent cause is the recapture of Army traitor Brett Halliday, who deserted to the Utes in a previous war; but Brett has a different story. With capture imminent, the only chance for the surviving men (and one woman) is to boat down a wild, uncharted river, where Harper and Halliday must pull together, like it or not.
metadata.Writer: George F. Slavin, George W. George
metadata.Actors: Dana Andrews, Piper Laurie, Rex Reason
